com.ogprover.polynomials
Class Term

java.lang.Object
  com.ogprover.polynomials.Term
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Term>
Direct Known Subclasses:
SymbolicTerm, UTerm, XTerm
public abstract class Term
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Term>, java.lang.Cloneable

Class description:
Base abstract class for all terms (products of powers and coefficient)

Version:
1.00
Author:
Ivan Petrovic

addPower

public void addPower(Power p)
Adds power to collection and keeps the sorting order.

Parameters:
p - Power to be added into collection

mergePowers

public void mergePowers(Term t,
                        boolean add)
This method merges powers of this term with powers from another passed in term - result is stored in current term. Both terms are of same variable type and they are sorted in descending order.

Parameters:
t - Term to be merged with current term
add - Indicator whether new powers are added to existing collection or they are subtracted from existing collection

isDivisibleByTerm

public final boolean isDivisibleByTerm(Term t)
Method for examining whether this term is divisible by some other term. Both terms are sorted in descending order.

Parameters:
t - Passed in term to examine whether current term is divisible by this one
Returns:
True if first term is divisible by passed in term, false otherwise

getVectorIndexOfVarIndex

public int getVectorIndexOfVarIndex(long varIndex)
Method that gives index in vector of powers where specified variable is placed

Parameters:
varIndex - Index of variable that is searched for in vector of powers
Returns:
Index in vector of powers where specified variable is placed or -1 if not found

getPowerOfVarIndex

public Power getPowerOfVarIndex(long varIndex)
Method that gives power object of specified variable from vector of powers.

Parameters:
varIndex - Index of variable that is searched for in vector of powers
Returns:
Power object of specified variable from vector of powers or null if not found

changePowerExponent

public Term changePowerExponent(int varIndex,
                                int expInc)
Increments the exponent of power of specified variable; if resulting exponent is zero, power is removed from collection.

Parameters:
varIndex - Index of variable
expInc - Exponent increment
Returns:
This term which is result of operation, or null in case of error

getVariableExponent

public final int getVariableExponent(int varIndex)
Method that gives power exponent of specified variable from term

Parameters:
varIndex - Index of variable
Returns:
Power exponent of specified variable if found, zero otherwise

gcd

public final Term gcd(Term t)
Method that finds gcd(greatest common divisor) of this and passed in term; both terms are sorted in descending order

Parameters:
t - Passed in term
Returns:
This term that makes gcd(this, t)
